name: BibleUP! Bible Riddles
description:
Who doesn't like bible riddles? For example, ‘Things that fell from the sky’? Or which biblical characters rode on a horse chariot?... The questions are endless, so is the fun!

In BibleUP! you will find these and many others bible riddles; you will have to resolve them to reach the next level and become the BibleUP! master.

The dynamic of the game is quite simple: find the 7 answers to each enigma. Dare to guess the secret words and if you can´t find them, use the ‘Clue Mode’ to get new insights and fresh ideas. Ask your friends for help or find the answers in your Bible.

BibleUP! is a suitable Christian game for the whole family, in which you will learn more about the Bible, having fun without running against the clock

After the huge success with ‘A Journey Towards Jesus’, Kupina.me is back to offer you its second Christian game for free.
